Test Name: Factor 8 Related Antigen (von Willebrand Factor) Immunostain
Purpose: To stain and identify Factor 8 Related Antigen in tissue sections for diagnostic evaluation of vascular structures.
Container: Paraffin tissue block with sections mounted on positively charged microscope slides
Equipment: Microtome, slide warmer/oven, water bath or pressure cooker for antigen retrieval, humidity chamber, microscope
